text: Gerry Lynn (May 28, 1952 â€“ September 6, 2020) was an American politician and lawyer. He was the Judge-Executive of Meade County, Kentucky from 2011 until his death. He was a member of the Kentucky House of Representatives from the 27th district from 2005 to 2007. He was a member of the Republican Party. Lynn died on September 6, 2020, in Brandenburg, Kentucky at age 68. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Lawyers from Kentucky Category:American judges Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Kentucky Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Gerry Lynn
